title: Women, Sex, and Addiction: A Search for Love and Power
description: A recognized expert on addiction, codependency, and child abuse provides an invaluable book for all women. "Sane, warm, wise . . . a chance for rebirth."--Gloria Steinem"Probably the single most significant text to date regarding women and sex addiction."--Edward Armstrong, National Association of Sex Addiction Problems
author: Charlotte Kasl
